name: free-timesheet-pro
description: FOSS Timesheet Pro - PWA PJ/Freelancer Tracker (100% Open Source)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w backend && npm run clean -w frontend
